general.description: This element contains configuration options valid for all certificates.

email.title: Account E-Mail-Address
email.description: The LetsEncrypt account e-mail-address used for requesting all certificates.

additional_arguments.title: Additional Arguments
additional_arguments.description: Global certbot arguments, added to all certbot calls. Examples include the parameter `--test-cert`, which instructs certbot to use the testing ACME API.

plugins.title: Globally Active Plugins
plugins.description: A list of plugins to run for all certificates. Specify the plugins by their filename in the folder `plugins`.

custom_certbot_binary.title: Custom Certbot Binary
custom_certbot_binary.description: The path to a custom certbot binary. Only needed if certbot is not in the PATH.

certificates.title: Individual Certificate Configurations
certificates.description: List of individual certificate configurations. At least one entry is required.

certificate_name.title: Certificate Name
certificate_name.description: The main domain name, used as identifier for this certificate.

additional_arguments.title: Additional Arguments (Optional)
additional_arguments.description: The certificate-specific certbot arguments,for example validator settings.

domains.title: Domains
domains.description: The domains to be included in this certificate. At least one domain must be specified.

plugins.title: Certificate specific plugins
plugins.description: Plugins to run specifically for this certificate

name.title: Plugin name
name.description: Filename of a plugin to run. Must exist in the cert-plugins folder, be executable and have a valid shebang.

settings.title: List of plugin settings
settings.description: List of plugin settings as key-value pairs. Available to the plugins as environment variables.
